steps.name: When  Admin gives the correct LMS portal URL
Then  Admin should land on the home page
Then  Admin enters valid credentials and clicks login button
Given  Admin is on Program Details modal window to Edit
When  Admin updates the program name "Manage Program" 5 field and clicks save button
